mapper.insert: insert into kq_appointment (pkid, userid, begintime, endtime, subject, placeID, isSync, photo, reaname) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{issync,jdbcType=BIT}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update kq_appointment set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, placeID = #{placeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isSync = #{issync,jdbcType=BIT}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reaname = #{reaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, userid, begintime, endtime, subject, placeID, isSync, photo, reaname from kq_appointment
